idea: Upstander Technologies in collaboration with a US based company has created and manufactured the world's most durable and longest cycling battery. The batteries are capable of doing 11,000 cycles at 80% depth of discharge, or 30 years - so basically you'll never have to replace them! This battery is a great solution for those who want a non-toxic storage option, that's durable and rugged, with the lowest lifetime cost, and the peace of mind that they will last for the long haul. Over a century ago, Thomas Edison found a battery design he considered nearly perfect. Today, Upstander is proud to offer an updated version of his incredible design. Upstander's Nickel Iron Battery is rated for at least 11,000 cycles. That’s more than 30 years with daily use. (dod)
name: UPSTANDER TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
